title.narrative: Implementation of gender equality and women’s empowerment commitments strengthened at national and local levels

description.narrative: Related national priorities as outlined in the National Strategy for Transformation 2017 - 2024 (NST1) Transformational Governance Pillar: - Priority area 5: Strengthen Capacity, Service delivery and Accountability of public institutions

description.narrative: Since year 2012, UN Women has been supporting the National Institute of Statistic of Rwanda (NISR) to produce sex disaggregated and gender sensitive data to easy the planning, monitoring and evaluation of how far Rwanda has gone to achieve gender equality

National Gender Machinery Institutions’ capacity to coordinate and oversee gender mainstreaming at national and local level strengthened
A functional National Gender and Family Promotion Cluster with a secretariat is in place.

description.narrative: The criteria for functionality of the gender cluster here are based on the staff of the secretariat are in place, an action plan for the cluster is produced and implemented, quarterly progress reports are produced

Number of Government institutions demonstrating capacity to strengthen accountability towards gender sensitive service delivery

description.narrative: The Gender Monitoring Office (GMO) is the only government institution (at this point) which has capacity to strengthen accountability towards gender sensitive service delivery. UN Women aims to support 5 more government institutions in this regards namely
